comment.author: 103376605@N07
comment._content: It's prince Chlodwig of Hohenlohe-Schillingsfürst (1819-1901), german chancellor from 1894 to 1900, and not prince Philipp Ernst!

comment.author: 103376605@N07
comment._content: It's prince Chlodwig of Hohenlohe-Schillingsfürst (born 1819, died 1901, german chancellor from 1894 to 1900) and not prince Philipp Ernst!
